Class Hospital

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Hospital
  • public class Hospital
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for creating the hospital, which by itself is not visualized, but will have the effect of isolating people that become infected with symptoms
